p: According to the obtained results presented in Table 4, a significant synergistic effects was observed in E. coli (FICI of 0.13), P. aeruginosa (FICI of 0.38) and S. aureus (FICI of 0.38) when there was a combination of GR-EO with Streptomycin, while an additive effect was seen in B. subtilis (FICI of 0.75).
